title: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
description: Bug 21706 - BidiUtil in win32 has Class.forName() usage
OB: The BidiUtil class in the win32 version of SWT has a line that uses Class.forName() to create a new Callback object.
EB: The usage of Class.forName() in BidiUtil should be modified to avoid throwing NoClassDefFoundError in the CLDC version of SWT.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Build the CLDC version of SWT.
2. Use jxeLink or a similar method to verify or use the built CLDC version.
3. Observe that the method in BidiUtil throws NoClassDefFoundError.
4. Modify the code in BidiUtil to remove the usage of Reflection, specifically the line that uses Class.forName().
